summary: A troubled young man, Li faces pressure at work and problems at home with his moody wife. Chuck, rescues Li from the brink of despair and becomes an unlikely mentor. But who is Chuck really?

keywords: imaginary friend|vigilante|past due bills|husband wife relationship|imaginary character
title: Inseparable
